Title: Typo3 Security Misconfiguration in User Session Handling
Description: When users change their password existing sessions for that particular user account are not revoked. A valid backend or frontend user account is required in order to make use of this vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.25, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.5.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.25 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.5.6
